name: Feudalia Conquest
description:
Feudalia Conquest is based on the physical board game "Feudalia", the deck building and resource management game of Abba Games.

Starting a basic initial deck of cards, you must improve your characters, while you build the different objectives that are presented on each level.

Game modes included:
- Tutorial.
- Solo campaign.
- Random missions, where the available characters and even the objetives change in each game.
